title: Course of Action Analysis for Cyber Attack
description: A cyber mission planner must evaluate two COAs to neutralize an adversary's air defense network: a kinetic strike vs. a non-kinetic cyberattack.

tasks.description: Develop the plans for both the kinetic strike COA (using missiles) and the cyberattack COA (using malware).
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates two detailed and distinct plans.

tasks.description: Assess the risks for each COA, including potential for collateral damage (kinetic) and risk of malware discovery (cyber).
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner accurately identifies the unique risks associated with each COA.

tasks.description: Compare the COAs based on probability of success, cost, and potential for escalation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner provides a clear comparison of the two options.

tasks.description: Recommend the cyberattack COA due to lower risk of escalation and no physical collateral damage.
